title: Biur Halacha
enDesc: R' Israel Meir Kagan's ("Chafetz Chaim") Biur Halakhah - "Explanation of the Law" - is a commentary tangential to the Mishnah Berurah, providing complex analysis of the legal rulings of earlier halachic authorities
